title: Rumpelstiltskin
creator_credit: David A. Smart and Coronet Instructional Films
brief_description: One of a series of films in which puppets are used to interpret folk legends. This film is an adaptation of the well-known fairy tale of the miller’s daughter and the strange little man who spun straw into gold for her.
